with almost ZERO marketing spend, i'm grateful to have had the following press/publications choose to feature the BITES foodie app...our app released in beta to metro-phoenix just a few short weeks ago...WE BELIEVE in creating experiencing that impact people and the planet in beneficial ways...ours is an ethos-driven app.

WHAT IF YOU WERE POWERFUL? what if you could wake up each day and create your own schedule? what if you could generate an income with zero overhead? what if you could express your creativity and passion and share that with people who were interested in being part of that journey? what if all socio-economic levels could experience a sense of adventure in their lives and what if you were the person to bring that adventure into their lives? what if people celebrated diversity, rather than barely tolerating it? what if community-building was a cool, hip thing to do and it was the norm? what if urban farms, community gardens, co-ops and backyard gardens were how we sourced our foods? what if we could always buy produce from our neighbors or grow it ourselves, rather than having it flown in from across the world? what if we could eat seasonally, nutritiously, sustainably, all at affordable prices? what if people cared about their communities and supported one another? what kind of world would that be?
WHAT IF YOU could create experiences that could impact people and the planet in beneficial ways?
JOIN our tribe...visit www.bites.mobi to learn more and get our free app..!
